MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML2 postcode area of Wishaw. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5pm to progress with repairs to faulty electrical equipment on Glencairn Avenue and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.55pm on Wednesday 24th March 2021.
